directions: Prepare mashed potatoes following package directions, set aside to cool.
Split jalapenos lengthwise and remove the seeds and membrane.
Stuff with 2 tablespoons of the mashed potatoes and wrap with a bacon slice.
Broil until bacon is slightly crisp
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) package Idahoan® Four Cheese Mashed Potatoes
title: Jalapeno Poppers from Idahoan®
